title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 204.3 - Rowdy, dangerous conduct
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 21 ยง 204.3 - Rowdy, dangerous conduct

State Regulations

No person shall engage in dangerous, boisterous or rowdy
conduct, or what is considered horseplay, or in any activity or conduct which
is likely to cause damage to any property or injury to any person, anywhere on
the authority facilities. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 21
ยง
204.3

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
